full_summary:
Security System for Maritime Centre
==============================

**Notice of Solicitation**
------------------------

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites bids for the supply, replacement, and programming of electronic security system control panels for Health Canada (HC).

**Solicitation Details**
------------------------

*   **Reference Number**: PW*HN-336*81347
*   **Solicitation Number**: H1121-214780/A
*   **Publication Date**: August 16, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date**: October 4, 2022, 14:00:00 (local time)
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Nova Scotia

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This solicitation falls under the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Tender Description**
----------------------

The requirement is for the supply and replacement of electronic security system control panels, as well as programming, for Health Canada. The system must be supplied in accordance with the technical specifications and mandatory criteria stated in Annex A - Statement of Work.

**Delivery Details**
--------------------

*   **Delivery Destination**: Halifax, Nova Scotia
*   **Requested Delivery Date**: On or before March 31, 2023

**Ineligibility and Business Requirements**
------------------------------------------

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Additional Information**
-------------------------

Further information on the solicitation and its associated documents can be accessed on the Canada Buys website.

**Important Dates**
-------------------

*   **Publication Date**: August 16, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date**: October 4, 2022, 14:00:00 (local time)

Document Available []
----------------------

For more information or to download the solicitation documents, please visit the [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).
